Title: Lemon Scented You
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on the novel by), Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Michael Green (developed for television by), David Graziano (teleplay by), Maria Melnik (staff writer)
Actors: Ricky Whittle, Emily Browning, Crispin Glover, Bruce Langley
Plot: Shadow's emotional reunion with his dead and unfaithful wife is interrupted when Mr. Wednesday shows up and they get a surprise visit.
